name: Hentai Tales: Sex Parlor Report
description:
GamePlay

Enjoy the story while completing the puzzles.
Connect lines according to the numbers on the squares until all spaces are completed.
After completing the puzzle, you will get a diary of the protagonist's experience.
Collect all diaries to experience the complete story.

Story Background

In modern times where sexual services are completely legal, sex workers are regarded as a noble profession.
You are a sex services reporter, and you are about to explore this world full of lust.
What could be there?

Characters

Mai:

Mai is a sex worker with a sex theme of cat girls who has short pink hair, a petite body, and a cat-like personality.
She likes to act like a spoiled kitty, and is a cute kitty girl who is lovable.

Haru:

An exotic-themed sex worker, with revealing exotic clothes, a perfect curvy figure.
A veil on her face to add a sense of mystery, and her coquettish sexual services bring a steady stream of customers.

Muku:

Muku is a cow-themed sex worker wears cow-patterned underwear and cow ears who has huge breasts and a plump figure.
Her elder sister-like service heals customers who long for love.

Features

  • An imaginary fantasy erotic story with heroines who have unique personalities.
  • 20 sexy erotic CGs of heroines.
  • Skip puzzles whenever you want. (Press Enter at puzzle).
  • CG appreciation mode. (Click the CG next to it after completing the puzzle)
